data.actual_result: The song doesn't show up, even though it's playing and Spotify knows it's playing.
data.expected_result: The song should show up as a status.
data.short_description: Listening to Spotify music on the Sonos sound system won't show as status
data.steps_to_repro: - Make sure that you have your Spotify account linked - Launch Spotify - Find a song and play it. It should show as status. - Pause the song. - Use the Connect to a device feature in Spotify to make your music play on a Sonos speaker on your WiFi network [Requires Premium]
